summary: Horse care management application named Noble Steeds with multiple horse profiles, injury logs, feed tracking, medicine dosage tracking, and chronological activity view
architectural_notes: Multi-horse management system with individual profiles
Image upload and storage for horse profile photos
Centralized activity timeline sorted by date

existing_features.title: Create a horse management system that allows users to add multiple horses with a name field and profile photo upload capability
Implement a care sections system where users can create different types of care sections and assign medicine and supplements to each section
Create an injury log system where users can record and track injuries for each horse
Build a feed tracker that allows users to log feeding events and track feed types and amounts for each horse
Implement a medicine dosage tracking system where users can record medicine administration with dosage information and timestamps
Create a unified chronological activity tab that displays all care activities (injuries, feeding, medicine administration, care sections) sorted by date for easy tracing

Design a cohesive visual theme for the Noble Steeds application using an equestrian-inspired color palette with earthy, natural tones (deep browns, forest greens, warm tans) and elegant typography that conveys professionalism and care, with spacious layouts that emphasize clarity and organization
Create a useDeleteHorse mutation hook in useQueries.ts that calls the backend deleteHorse function and invalidates the horses query on success
Add a delete button to each HorseCard component that triggers horse deletion with confirmation dialog
Remove the CareSectionForm and CareSectionList components from the HorseDetailPage component so that the care sections tab is no longer displayed or accessible
Remove care section related query and mutation hooks from useQueries.ts including useCareSections, useCreateCareSection, useAddMedicineToSection, and useAddSupplementToSection
Update the HorseCard delete confirmation dialog text to remove mention of care sections from the warning message about cascading deletion

Create a CareForm component in frontend/src/components/CareForm.tsx with a text input field for care type and a submit button that calls a useLogCareActivity mutation hook to create new care activity records

Create a CareList component in frontend/src/components/CareList.tsx that displays care activities for a horse with timestamps and care type descriptions, following the same pattern and styling as InjuryList, FeedingList, and MedicineDosageList

Add useLogCareActivity mutation hook and useCareActivities query hook to frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts following the same patterns as injury, feeding, and medicine hooks with proper cache invalidation
Add a Care tab to the HorseDetailPage component that displays the CareForm and CareList components, positioned consistently with the existing Injuries, Feeding, and Medicine tabs
Update the useActivityTimeline hook in frontend/src/hooks/useActivityTimeline.ts to include care activities in the merged timeline, using type 'care' and the careType field for description

Update the ActivityTimelineItem component in frontend/src/components/ActivityTimelineItem.tsx to handle and display care activity items with an appropriate icon (e.g., Heart or Stethoscope) and styling consistent with other activity types

new_feature_requests.summary: Add multiple horses with photo upload capability for profile pictures
Unified chronological tab to trace all activities by date
Feed tracker for monitoring horse feeding
Add ability to remove/delete horses from the list
Add a deleteHorse backend function that removes a horse and all its associated data (care sections, injuries, feeding events, medicine dosages) from storage

Remove all care section related backend functions including createCareSection, getCareSectionsForHorse, addMedicineToSection, addSupplementToSection, and delete all care section storage maps (careSections, careSectionMedicines, careSectionSupplements)
Update the deleteHorse backend function to remove the cascading deletion of care sections since care sections are being removed from the system
Add a care section allowing users to log custom care activities (thrush check, bath, tail wash, fungus check, hives, etc.)

Add a CareActivity type to the backend with fields for id (Nat), horseId (Nat), careType (Text for user-entered care descriptions like 'thrush check', 'bath', 'tail wash', 'fungus check', 'hives'), timestamp (Int for nanoseconds), and userId (Principal)
Add a stable careActivities HashMap in the backend actor to store care activities with auto-incrementing IDs, following the same pattern as injuries, feedingEvents, and medicineDosages

Create a logCareActivity backend function that accepts horseId and careType text, validates the horse exists, creates a new care activity record with the current timestamp, stores it in careActivities HashMap, and returns the created activity
Create a getCareActivitiesForHorse backend query function that accepts a horseId and returns an array of all care activities for that horse, sorted by timestamp descending
Update the deleteHorse backend function to cascade delete all care activities associated with the horse being deleted
